title: What is the interpretation of pouring coffee in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Pouring coffee in a dream. Seeing coffee in a dream often indicates good news that the dreamer will receive, God willing, but it also has some unpleasant interpretations, and in this case it depends on the type of dreamer and what he feels in the dream. Pouring coffee in a dream: Seeing someone pouring Coffee in a dream means that he helps the poor and has some good qualities of generosity and kindness to everyone without any return. A person’s dream of pouring coffee and its beautiful smell symbolizes his happiness with the successes and progress he is achieving at this time in his life. Seeing the dreamer pouring coffee in a dream means that he will have a lot of Money in the coming period, God willing. When a person sees that he is pouring coffee, this is a sign that he is loved by the people around him. Seeing the dreamer pouring coffee in a dream means that he will be surprised by some good news at that time, God willing. When a person sees that he is pouring coffee in a dream This is a sign of his intelligence and courage and that he achieves everything he desires. In general, pouring coffee in a dream is a sign of happiness and stability in the dreamer’s life. Pouring coffee in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing coffee in a dream as a sign of relieving stress. And removing anxiety from the dreamer’s life. If the dreamer sees that he is pouring coffee in his dream, this means that he is constantly thinking about his life and trying to find solutions to all the problems he faces. When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is pouring coffee, adding saffron to it, and drinking it with his friend, he loves him very much and supports him in All aspects of his life. If the dreamer spills coffee in an unknown place, this is a sign that he will travel abroad. Seeing coffee spilled in a dream shows the dreamer that he is in good health and is also a sign of achieving goals and aspirations that the person has had for a while. Pouring coffee in A dream for a single woman: Seeing pouring coffee in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates to a large number of people that she will soon marry a good man. Pouring coffee in a dream about a girl who is not related to her can be a sign of the randomness and the way he treats others. Seeing pouring Coffee in a dream for a girl symbolizes that she will receive some happy news in the coming period that will make her happy and make her heart happy. Pouring coffee in a dream for a married woman When a married woman dreams of pouring coffee, this indicates stability in her married life and she does not suffer from any problems or disagreements with her husband. Vision A married woman pouring coffee in a dream shows beautiful qualities that she possesses, such as courage and good morals. If a married woman dreams that she is pouring coffee and is suffering from some problems in her life, this indicates that she is close to comfort, God willing, and all these problems will disappear. Seeing a married woman pouring coffee in a dream It symbolizes that she will get a lot of money in the coming period. Pouring coffee in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman pouring coffee in a dream indicates the type of fetus that will be male, and God knows best. Seeing a woman

title: Carrying someone in a dream and the meaning of seeing someone carrying me

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a dream carrying someone in a dream, and see the opinions of dream interpreters on the interpretation of seeing someone carrying me in a dream, the meaning of seeing a sick person carrying a sick person in a dream and the interpretation of a dream of carrying someone you love. Carrying someone in a dream Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream has an interpretation Different depending on the person carrying the fortuneteller and the interpretation varies according to the state of the fortuneteller. The interpretation also varies according to the position in which this person is carried, whether on the shoulder or in the arms. The interpretation of dreaming of carrying a person in a dream in general interpretations indicates that this person is responsible if he knows about it The interpretation of a dream about carrying a heavy person in a dream could be a sign of bearing sins and disobedience and could indicate a bad neighbor. As for carrying a light person in his arms in a dream, it could indicate the weight of his worries, which means that the dreamer is concerned with his affairs. As for the interpretation Dreaming of carrying an unknown person in a dream, this indicates the weight of worries and responsibilities. Carrying a child in a dream if he is crying indicates anxiety, and if he is happy or beautiful, then it is a good and humanitarian sign. And the dream interpretation of carrying a mother on her back in a dream, this is evidence that she is satisfied. On the authority of the fortune teller, and God knows best. As for the burden in the dream, if it is on the shoulders or neck, it is not praised in general interpretations, and indicates separation. See also: Shoulder in a dream Carrying someone on his back in a dream Seeing someone carrying me in a dream Seeing someone carrying me in The dream means that this person will bear your responsibilities or bear your mistakes and problems. Seeing someone carrying me in a dream also means that this person loves you and is trying to make you happy or that he supports you. Seeing someone carrying me in a dream can also indicate your need for support and your need for someone to stand up Next to you. Seeing a sick person pregnant in a dream. Seeing a sick person carrying in a dream could mean that the dreamer is going through a difficult period and will overcome it, God willing. Perhaps the interpretation of seeing a sick person carrying a sick person in a dream indicates the dreamer’s support and standing by his side. As for the interpretation of dreaming about seeing a sick person carrying in a dream Sick on his neck, it is considered an unpleasant vision. Interpretation of dreams of carrying someone you love. Interpretation of a dream that you are carrying someone you love in a dream is a sign of your support for him and your effort to help him. A husband carrying his wife in a dream is a sign of his ability to bear what is asked of him, and if it is heavy, this indicates On her many demands. And carrying a woman in a dream if it is theft, this indicates her appreciation for the husband and her support for him. Interpretation of a dream that a person cannot bear. Interpretation of a dream that he cannot bear may indicate that the dreamer is trying to reach a topic and cannot reach it. Also, interpretation of dreams What you cannot carry in a dream is an indication of obstacles and obstacles in front of the dreamer. Other cases of transporting a person in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of a person riding on the neck of another person and then falling, an indication that he has not achieved anything in the matter he sought. The interpretation of the dream that you rode on the neck of a person The knight was happy, indicating that God would provide him with good deeds at the end of his life

title: Interpretation of a dream about my mother wearing gold bracelets in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my mother wearing gold bracelets in a dream. Dreams can have different meanings, whether it is good or not. Interpretation of a dream about my mother wearing gold bracelets in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother wearing gold bracelets in a dream can lead to unwanted things, by God. I know everything that we do not see. If a married woman sees that my mother is wearing golden bracelets in a dream, this may indicate anxiety, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the mother wearing golden bracelets in a dream, this may be a sign of trouble, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a divorced woman sees a mother in a dream wearing golden bracelets, This may indicate trouble, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my mother wearing a beautiful dress in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother wearing a beautiful dress in a dream can lead to goodness and happiness, God willing. If a married woman sees a new dress, it may indicate new events, and God knows the unseen. When she sees a new dress in a dream, it may symbolize To success, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a divorced woman sees a new dress in a dream, it means goodness and happiness, and God has all knowledge of the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my mother walking with me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother walking with me in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a mother in a dream can represent happiness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees a mother in a dream, this can lead to goodness and happiness, and God has all knowledge. If an unmarried girl sees a mother, it may mean that Safety, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of my mother’s dream of combing my hair in a dream. Interpretation of my mother’s dream of combing my hair in a dream could be a sign of love and care, and God knows everything. If a married woman sees her mother reviving her hair, this may indicate a message from the mother that preserves her personality, and God knows best. If a married woman sees her mother reviving her hair, this may indicate a message from the mother that preserves her personality, and God knows best. If A divorced woman saw a mother combing her hair in a dream, this may indicate concern for her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees a mother combing her hair in a dream, this may be a sign of money and livelihood, and God knows the unseen.Interpretation of a dream about my mother eating meat in a dreamInterpretation of dreams about eating meat In a dream, eating cooked meat can turn into good, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if the dreamer sees himself eating cooked meat in a dream, this may be a sign of stability and prosperity, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself in a dream eating meat, this may indicate Happy news, and God knows best. While eating raw meat in a dream portends unpleasant things, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of my mother’s dream about eating dates in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my mother eating dates in a dream. To see her eating dates indicates kindness and sustenance, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Likewise, if a married woman is seen eating dates, it may lead to... That is due to faith and good speech, and God knows best all that is unseen. If the dreamer sees himself eating dates in a dream, this may be a sign of sustenance, God willing. When you see yourself eating dates in a dream, this may represent the recitation of the Qur’an, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting a dress according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cutting a dress in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi, as there are many dreams and visions that a person dreams about during sleep, which are sometimes a correct vision and sometimes dream of constantly thinking about various worldly matters, and this is what makes a person care about interpreting such dreams, especially since a cut dress is one of the annoying things for many people. From the people, and today we will show you what is the interpretation of a dream about a cut dress in a dream about Nabulsi, according to the sheikhs of interpretation who have always spoken. About the connotations and meanings of such dreams. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a dress according to Nablus: A cutting dress is an annoying dream for many people, which has made many dreamers search for the meaning of this dream in a dream, as it is one of the most recent dreams, and we will show you what is the correct interpretation according to people’s interpretation. However, if the clothes that the dreamer is wearing are new but torn, then this vision shows the dreamer’s inability to give birth to males in particular, male or female. The Nabulsi scholar says that seeing a torn garment in a dream is evidence of people conspiring against him, so he must beware of Everyone around him. If the dreamer is a woman and she sees her clothes torn in a dream, then this vision indicates that there are many people who doubt the honor of this woman. If a person’s clothes are torn lengthwise, this indicates narrow relief and freedom from trouble. See also: Interpretation of dreams Nightmares in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of wearing a torn dress in a dream for a married woman. A married woman is the most sensitive to dreams and quickly searches for the interpretation of such dreams in a dream and what they lead to in a dream, so there is a lot of research on such dreams from them, especially since a torn dress is one of What worries them, and today we will explain to you what is the interpretation of a dream about wearing an exclusively torn dress in a dream. Whoever dreams that he is buying torn or used clothes, this indicates poverty and the deterioration of the financial situation of the owner of this dream. Whoever sees that he is wearing an old, worn-out dress, this indicates separation between the spouses, Whoever sees a lot of torn clothes and not a dress, this may be a sign of the death of a relative in the near future. The scholar Ibn Shaheen says that seeing torn clothes in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the presence of some girls in her life who are planning machinations and problems for her, so she should beware of Her friends. Also, an unmarried girl wearing torn clothes in a dream indicates the girl’s bad reputation among people, and this matter may cause a delay in her marriage. See also: Interpretation of a dream about screaming at a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of piercing clothes in a dream for a pregnant woman. There are many dreams that should Searching for it, which has become of great importance to researchers, and which carries good or bad connotations, including the presence of clothes with holes and pieces cut into pieces, is terrifying for a pregnant woman, and there are many indications about this dream in a dream, which are as follows: Also, dreaming of a torn dress can be evidence. On the presence of magic in the dreamer’s life, and this magic is related to not having children, especially if it is a dress

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing travel in a dream about a married woman according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing travel in a dream for a married woman: A married woman sees many dreams, including a dream that makes her a happy woman, and some of them warn her of the appearance of evil, worry her, and warn her of the vision that she saw in her dream, which prompts her to search for explanations. From these visions to know their connotations and meanings and the most prominent evidence for this, as the dream of seeing travel in a dream is one of the results of dreams that make women happy with this vision, as many women want to travel to see it. Many places they have not seen before. Interpretation of a dream about seeing travel in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about seeing travel for a married woman. Interpretation scholars have worked to interpret many visions related to married women based on the nature of the dream and the nature of the dreamer. Seeing a married woman traveling in a dream is evidence that she has achieved Goals that she was striving to achieve. If a married woman sees traveling in her dream, this indicates her desire to travel and visit many places. If a married woman intends to travel and sees in her dream that she is traveling, this is an indication of her desire to have a new child. Traveling in a woman’s dream A married woman indicates her desire for a job different from the one she works on. A married woman cancels her travel, as this indicates the emergence of problems with her husband that may lead to divorce or deprivation of motherhood. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman returning to her husband in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams to see a woman A married woman travels according to Ibn Sirin. The well-known and well-known science of interpretation by Ibn Sirin also worked on interpreting various visions related to a married woman, including the interpretation of a dream about seeing a journey, which carries many connotations, such as: The dream of a married woman traveling indicates the failure of her married life. If a married woman sees She is traveling with her husband and there were problems during the trip, so this is a sign of her divorce. A long trip in a married woman’s dream is an indication of the abundance of sustenance that the dreamer will gain. If a married woman dreams of traveling, this is an indication that she is suffering from a financial crisis or suffering and hardship in her family. See also : Interpretation of the dream of seeing a palace in a dream for a single or married woman by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about traveling for a married woman in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. In addition to the above, the interpreter scholar Ibn Shaheen worked on interpreting the dream of a married woman traveling with a set of connotations and interpretations, based on the nature of the woman’s journey, such as: Seeing a woman A married woman traveling in her dream means that her situation will change for the better. If a married woman sees that she is traveling in a dream, this means that she feels sad and uncomfortable due to a financial crisis in her life. A married woman’s dream of traveling to an unknown place indicates confusion and confusion in her life. If a married woman sees If a married woman is in a place where there is food and drink, this is a sign that she has heard the good news. See also: Is stealing in a dream good news? Interpretation of a dream about theft in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a married woman traveling with Nabulsi. Imam Nabulsi also worked on his interpretation

title: Interpretation of seeing war in a dream, interpretations of different situations

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing war in a dream is interpretations of different situations, from nightmares that some people suffer from, especially in politically unstable countries that have many internal and external problems. Sometimes it carries positive interpretations, so in this article today we will learn about the interpretation of seeing war in a dream and interpretations of different situations. Interpretation of a dream about seeing war in a dream When the dreamer sees that there is a war between two sultanates in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will see His country is going through great strife. It may also indicate that the dreamer will witness his country being exposed to many diseases and epidemics. • When the dreamer sees that there is a war between nationals in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will witness a rise in prices in his country. It can also indicate that the dreamer will witness food fights in his country. When the dreamer sees that there is a war between the ruler and the subjects in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will witness a state of prosperity in his country. It can also indicate that the dreamer will see the cheapest prices in his country. • When the dreamer sees that people are circling around the ruler in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will see his country being harmed. It may also indicate that the dreamer will witness injustice against the people of his country. Interpretation of a dream about seeing war at work in a dream When the dreamer sees that there is a war in his workplace in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will bring about a radical change in the workplace. Also, when the dreamer sees that there is a war going on in his house in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will have some family disputes. When the dreamer, who is a married woman, sees that there is a war between her husband and the ruler in the dream, this may mean that the dreamer The dream will seriously oppress her husband. Also, when the married dreamer sees in a dream that there is a war between her husband and the ruler, this may indicate that the dreamer will harm her husband. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an aircraft war in a dream When the dreamer sees that there is a war with aircraft inside his country and they are defeated in the dream, this may indicate This means that the dreamer will suffer from a strong earthquake. Also, when the dreamer sees that he is fighting for the sake of God in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will have many good things in his life. When the dreamer sees that he is fighting for the sake of God in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will have For money and an exciting life. Also, when the dreamer sees that he was fighting and leaving the war to his children in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be affected by the corruption of religion. When the dreamer sees that he fought and then fled from the war for the sake of his children in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will He will be the one who breaks the relationship. Also, if the dreamer sees in a dream an unmarried girl whose fiancé has gone to war, this may indicate that the dreamer will hear bad news about her fiancé. Interpretation of a dream about seeing war in a dream for a married woman: When

title: What exactly does it mean to see yourself eating honey in a dream?

preview.html: The Hadot website provides you with an explanation of how you dream of eating honey. It is known that honey or honey is one of the greatest blessings that God has bestowed upon us in this world and which we mentioned in the Holy Qur’an (So eat all the fruits and follow the path of your Lord with evil and humiliation against Him. It contains medicine for people, as it contains a reference to those who meditate (verse 69) Surah An-Nahl, so it is common that Many people see in a dream eating bees. What are the books of scholars and interpretation of dreams and dreams, and how did we collect them for you? Interpretation of sleep: Honey in a complete dream for elderly women, married women, pregnant women, and men. Honey in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq. Imam al-Sadiq told us that seeing honey eating honey in a dream is full of visions that It indicates to the dreamer that he will be given a lot of money, and this is evidence of kindness and happiness. When a sick person sees in his dream that he is eating honey, this is evidence that God will heal him from his illness and his health will improve. Completely licking honey on his tongue in a dream - a good omen, happy days for the dreamer to live in. And pleasant surprises in his next life. In a dream, full honey with bread, it shows the dreamer, if he is not married, that his marriage will be a good and great improvement in his next life and he will have a beautiful wife. Eating honey in a dream is complete for an ordinary woman. Complete interpretation of seeing an unmarried girl eating honey In a dream, it is evidence of those good and happy days that you will live and you will get many benefits during this period. Also, seeing a perfect man in a dream feeding a girl with honey is one of the signs that symbolizes the speed of her engagement and marriage to a man who suits her well. Seeing a perfect girl in a dream She eats honey with her tongue and then gives it to someone is also one of the visions that indicate marriage and days full of joy and pleasures. Seeing a full woman in a dream eating honey with wax for a woman in a bowl means that she will fulfill many desires and this is a sign of success and success in what she seeks in life. Why? Dreaming that you are eating honey for a married woman. Seeing a married woman eating honey in a dream indicates many graces and blessings and that God will glorify her with kindness, support of children, righteous heirs, and money. Seeing honey in a dream full of honey for a married woman indicates many positive events that she will experience in her life and its significance. On happiness, joy and excitement. Eating honey in a dream for a worried or sick woman is good news and a sign of the end of problems and worries and getting rid of diseases in health and safety. Why dream of a pregnant woman eating beeswax? The interpretation is honey for a pregnant woman in a complete dream - one of the good visions that have many meanings. Of happiness, prosperity, good health and overcoming illness. Seeing honey in a dream filled with a pregnant woman is evidence that she will endure an easy and affordable pregnancy without any problems and will give birth to a healthy child. Why dream that you are eating honey with wax? Eating honey by candlelight in a dream is full of dreams that It shows the dreamer getting closer to God and staying away from sins, disobedience, and bad circumstances

title: Interpretation of a dream about beans in a dream - the symbol of green beans in a dream

preview.html: Beans are one of the basic foods that most people rely on in their meals because they contain a good percentage of protein, in addition to many ways in which beans can be prepared. Their opinions on the interpretation of this vision will be explained to you. Interpretation of a dream about tea cups in a dream. Interpretation of seeing beans in a dream. Al-Nabulsi says that delicious beans indicate that the dreamer will gain abundant money and a great living. As for dry beans, it indicates that the dreamer is facing some difficulties and challenges that It appears to him in his current work environment. A large plate of beans in a dream is a sign of good luck for the dreamer. An unmarried girl eating beans with her lover in a dream foretells that she will marry this lover despite his unfavorable financial circumstances. A married woman eating beans with her husband shows her feeling With stability in her life with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about washing clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing beans in a dream. Buying beans in a dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve his desired goals and dreams. Buying beans in a single person’s dream may lead to his marriage to a girl in whom he will find the characteristics he wants. Buying beans in a patient’s dream indicates his imminent recovery from the disease, God willing. A pregnant woman who buys beans in a dream promises her good news that she will give birth to the gender of the child she wants. Interpretation of seeing a dream about a sister in a dream about her brother and sister in a dream. The meaning of seeing cooked beans in a dream: seeing a girl An unmarried woman is cooking beans, and she may get married in the near future or become engaged and officially engaged if she is not in a relationship. A married woman who is cooking beans in a dream may predict that she will become pregnant and give birth to a male child, God willing. As for a pregnant woman who sees in a dream that she is cooking beans, she will give birth Within a few days of this vision and she must prepare for it. As for the divorced woman who sees herself cooking beans, she has the ability to overcome the trials and tribulations that this woman will face after the divorce. Cooking beans in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will escape from his debts and financial crises. Interpretation of a dream Thirst in a dream for a single woman. The meaning of seeing beans in a dream. Planting beans in a dream is a sign of good conditions for children and their upbringing. Planting beans indicates that the dreamer will get rid of the negative thoughts that he suffered from. Planting beans in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will Many good deeds that he does not expect in return. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is planting beans, she can give birth naturally, God willing. Planting beans indicates that the dreamer is trying to obtain lawful money that has a blessing. Interpretation of dreams for single women singing in a dream. Interpretation Seeing green beans in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a dream about school in a dream for a single woman. Green beans in a dream indicate the abundance of nutrition that the dreamer will receive. Green beans in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate the health of the mother and fetus, God willing. Al-Fas

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person upset in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the deceased being upset in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Many people care about the condition of the dead person and his fate, especially if this deceased person was one of their relatives or relatives, and this concern and excessive thinking can cause seeing the dead in a dream in different situations, and there are some sources that say Dreams are messages from the dead to their loved ones who are still alive, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a dead person being upset in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead person upset in a dream, Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Below is the interpretation of seeing a dead person sad in The dream, according to what was narrated by the great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin: The dreamer seeing that the deceased is sad and crying in the dream indicates the problems and pain that the dreamer is going through and that the deceased feels and grieves for. The intense crying of the deceased in a dream symbolizes the torment of the grave as a result of the sins and disobedience he committed. Seeing The deceased in a dream accusing the fortuneteller indicates the deceased’s anger at what the dreamer is doing and the decisions he makes. Seeing a group of dead people sitting in a state of sadness means that the dreamer will face financial difficulties or major family quarrels. Interpretation of the dream in which I saw my deceased father bothering me in a dream. Here is the interpretation of the vision through the following points. A dead father in a dream and he is sad: A son who sees his deceased father sad in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to poverty and trouble. Seeing a dead father sitting among a group of dead people, all in mourning, indicates sins and transgressions committed by the dreamer. Seeing a father in a dream He is angry and in a nervous state, meaning that the dreamer is doing things that anger the father and that he is not satisfied with the dreamer. Seeing the deceased father admonishing his son in a dream indicates his need for prayer and zakat. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the dead silent in a dream. We present below different interpretations of seeing the dead silent in a dream: A woman appears silent. A married woman sees a dead person in a dream. Her fear of the future and her holding his hand and trying to talk to him shows the benefit that she will get in the next life. Seeing a married woman silent in a dream and pointing with her finger in different directions indicates the livelihood that she will enjoy soon. Seeing a man symbolizes that he Sitting with a dead person, he is silent about the good that the dreamer will receive, but he does not know its source at the time of the vision. A pregnant woman’s dream of a dead person indicates some problems and pains that she may suffer due to her pregnancy, but they will end by God’s command. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead person upset by living in a dream. A vision The dead are angry in a dream from unpleasant dreams, we convey their interpretation as follows:This dream shows what the dreamer does about sins and misdeeds. The anger of the deceased in a dream sometimes symbolizes not fully implementing his will. Seeing a mother or father screaming in a dream means that the dreamer will fall into misfortunes He will not be able to get rid of them easily. Seeing a sick person in a dream calling for the dead is a bad omen of the dreamer’s death, and God Almighty alone knows the time. While the dreamer is wiping the tears of his parents in the dream, it shows their satisfaction with him and his

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead person alive in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a dead person alive in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, death has become one of the greatest things that causes destruction to a person, and seeing it in a dream carries several different interpretations and meanings, especially since interpretive scholars have relied on the social position of the pioneer, regardless of the events that the dreamer narrates, which differ from Person to person, it is known that seeing a dead person in a dream can be a good omen and it can be a bad omen. It is reflected in the life of the dreamer. In our article, we will shed light on the interpretation of the dream of seeing the dead alive in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the dead alive in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing the dead alive in a dream has different interpretations, as it is based on the social status of the dreamer, In addition to the events narrated by the dreamer, and among those interpretations contained are: If someone sees in a dream that the dead person is alive and speaks to him in the dream, and he knows that well, and he came to him in the dream to tell him that he is alive and not dead, then this is a sign of the dead person’s status and position in Paradise. And his comfort and enjoyment in the other world. In addition, seeing the dead person and talking to him indicates that what the dead person says is true, so if he hears something from him, he tells him the truth of something, and this interpretation is due to the fact that the dead person... He is in the abode of truth, so he cannot lie. The interpretation of a dream about sitting with the dead and talking to him indicates the state of longing that the dreamer experiences from time to time, and this makes him remember the previous days that brought him close to the dead. And God knows the unseen. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a mother’s death in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its interpretation of seeing a dead person alive in a dream and crying over him. According to what Imam Nabulsi narrated, he explained that he sees the deceased alive in a dream and that the dreamer is crying over him. This has some of the following meanings, such as: We find that the dream of a deceased person when the living person comes and cries loudly, indicates that the deceased is suffering from severe torment in the afterlife and needs and wants the living person to have mercy on him and pray for him to rest. His martyrdom. But if one sees in a dream that the dead person has returned to life, we find that it indicates the good condition of the dead person, and that he has a good standing with God Almighty. And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person alive in a dream while he is sick. The interpretation of a dream about a dead person alive differs from his interpretation in the case of being alive and sick in a dream. In general, seeing a dead person in a dream is one of the dreams that many people are pessimistic about. . But who can bring the praiseworthy and righteous meaning to the dreamer, and from those interpretations that were obtained: We find that seeing a dead person in a dream while he is sick means that he did not fulfill his duty of good deeds, but he was not satisfied with them, so he needs a lot of supplication and charity for his soul. In addition, seeing the deceased sick indicates unhappiness and unhappiness with God due to certain circumstances he is going through during this period. In addition, we find that the deceased is close to the fortuneteller, so seeing his illness is evidence that the fortuneteller has been exposed to illness in the recent period. From It is possible that seeing a dead person during illness indicates...
